channel.title: Please help! its stopping me from everything!

item.title: Please help! its stopping me from everything!
item.dc:creator: @JavaTC JavaTC
item.description:
@JavaTC wrote:

I would recommend Restarting your computer, uninstalling java, and then re download the latest JDK update.

item.source: Please help! its stopping me from everything!

item.title: Please help! its stopping me from everything!
item.dc:creator: @filippo168 filippo168
item.description:
@filippo168 wrote:

I can’t compile my RSPS. Im on windows 7, and when i compile it says in the CMD: You do not have java installed, install it at the site that is about to load. Finished! -
I am very confused about this, nothing loads at all…
When i click edit on compiler, it says
@echo off
@TITLE l33tpwnzscape source Compiler
echo Compiling…
if exist “%program files (x86)%\Java” (call :compile “%program files (x86)%\Java”) else (goto error)
:compile
for /D %%x in ("%~1jdk*") do (set p="%%~x\bin\javac.exe")
if defined p (%p% -cp . *.java)
if defined p (goto end)
:error
echo You do not have Java installed. Please download it at the site that is about to load.
:end
echo Finished!
pause
exit
PLEASE HELP!!
Thanks for reading,
Filippo <3

Read full topic
item.source: Please help! its stopping me from everything!
